translations.text: islawhal Yawma bimaa kuntum takfuroon

words.id: pada hari ini||Kami kunci/tutup||atas||mulut-mulut mereka||dan berkata kepada Kami||tangan-tangan mereka||dan memberi kesaksian||kaki-kaki mereka||dengan/terhadap apa||adalah mereka||mereka usahakan
words.en: This Day||We will seal||[on]||their mouths||and will speak to Us||their hands||and will bear witness||their feet||about what||they used (to)||earn

translations.text: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim Wa-tukallimunaaa aideehim Wa-tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

words.id: dan jika||Kami menghendaki||tentu Kami hapuskan/gelapkan||atas||penglihatan mata mereka||lalu mereka berlomba-lomba||jalan||maka bagaimana||mereka melihat
words.en: And if||We willed||We (would have) surely obliterated||[over]||their eyes||then they (would) race||(to find) the path||then how||(could) they see

translations.text: Wa-law nashaaa'u lata-masna 'alaaa aiyyunihim fasta-baqus siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon

words.id: dan jika||Kami menghendaki||tentu Kami rubah rupa mereka||atas||tempat mereka berada||maka tidak||mereka sanggup||maju/berjalan||dan tidak||mereka kembali
words.en: And if||We willed||surely We (would have) transformed them||in||their places||then not||they would have been able||to proceed||and not||return

translations.text: Wa-law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon

words.id: dan barangsiapa||Kami panjangkan umurnya||Kami kembalikan dia||dalam/kepada||kejadian||apakah maka tidak||mereka menggunakan akal/berpikir
words.en: And (he) whom||We grant him long life||We reverse him||in||the creation||Then will not||they use intellect

translations.text: Wa-man nu-'ammirhu nunakkishu fil khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon

words.id: dan tidak||Kami mengajarkannya||syair||dan tidak||layak||baginya||tidak||ia||kecuali||peringatan/pelajaran||dan bacaan||nyata
words.en: And not||We taught him||[the] poetry||and not||it is befitting||for him||Not||it||(is) except||a Reminder||and a Quran||clear

translations.text: Wa-maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra Wa-maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen

words.id: supaya dia memberi peringatan||orang-orang||adalah||hidup||dan pasti berlaku||perkataan/azab||atas||orang-orang kafir
words.en: To warn||(him) who||is||alive||and may be proved true||the Word||against||the disbelievers

translations.text: Liyunzira man kaana haiyyanw wa-yahiqqal qawlu 'alal kaafireen

words.id: ataukah tidak||mereka melihat/memperlihatkan||bahwasannya Kami||Kami telah menciptakan||untuk mereka||dari sebagian apa||mengerjakan/menciptakan||tangan/kekuasaan Kami||binatang ternak||lalu mereka||padanya||mereka memiliki/menguasai
words.en: Do not||they see||that We||[We] created||for them||from what||have made||Our hands||cattle||then they||[for them]||(are the) owners

translations.text: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon

words.id: dan Kami tundukkannya||untuk mereka||maka sebagiannya||tunggangan mereka||dan sebagiannya||mereka makan
words.en: And We have tamed them||for them||so some of them||they ride them||and some of them||they eat

translations.text: Wa-zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum Wa-minhaa ya'kuloon

words.id: dan bagi mereka (memperoleh)||padanya||kemanfaatan||dan minuman||apakah maka tidak||mereka bersyukur
words.en: And for them||therein||(are) benefits||and drinks||so (will) not||they give thanks

translations.text: Wa-lahum feehaa manaa-fi'u Wa-mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon

words.en: But they have taken||besides||besides||Allah||gods||that they may||be helped

translations.text: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon

words.id: tidak||mereka tidak kuasa||menolong mereka||sedang mereka||untuk mereka||bala tentara||dihadapkan/disiapkan
words.en: Not||they are able||to help them||but they||for them||(are) host(s)||(who will) be brought

translations.text: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum Wa-hum lahum jundum muhdaroon

words.id: maka janganlah||menyedihkan kamu||perkataan mereka||sesungguhnya Kami||Kami mengetahui||apa||yang mereka rahasiakan||dan apa yang||mereka nyatakan
words.en: So (let) not||grieve you||their speech||Indeed We||[We] know||what||they conceal||and what||they declare

translations.text: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona Wa-maa yu'linoon

translations.text: Wa-daraba lanaa maslanw wa-nasiya khalqahoo qaala maien yuhyil izaama Wa-hiya rameem
